#include<stdio.h>
int lcm(int a,int b)
{
    int i,f=0;
    i = a>b ? a:b;
    while(f==0)
    {
            if(i%a==0 && i%b==0)
                   f=1;
            else
                   i++;
    }
    return i;
}
int hcf(int a,int b)
{
    if(b==0)
         return a;
    else
        return hcf(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
    int n,i=0,num,den,h=1,l=1;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    scanf("%d%d",&num,&den);
    l=den;
    h=num;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
          scanf("%d%d",&num,&den);
          h=hcf(h,num);
          l=lcm(l,den);
    }
    num=h;
    den=l;
    h=hcf(num,den);
    printf("%d/%d\n",(num/h),(den/h));
    return 0;
}
